name: Community Sanitation Support System
description: Digital platform that links low-income households, providers of regulated sanitation and waste management services, microfinance institutions and municipalities to create an inclusive marketplace based on geo-fenced supply and demand of on-site sanitation services and household waste collection in Cote dâ€™Ivoire.

SDGs.evidenceText: CSSS will increase access to sanitation value chain services and products to contribute to a clean environment and improved health outcomes.
